backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI branding-removal changes and logo-fallback behavior with linked files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their roles, styling, and branding updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component wrapping HomePage with AppErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/assets/generatedAssets.ts: Exports constants for generated logo and hero background asset paths.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: Error boundary that shows a styled fallback UI with reload capability when render errors occur.
frontend/src/components/site/BrandLogo.t: Logo component rendering the image with size variants and a non-text visual fallback on load failure.
Footer displaying BrandLogo, support email, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution.
Layout wrapper providing page structure with main content and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context handling login, identity loading, and status management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind theme defining emerald/teal palette, warm neutrals, and dark-mode variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient, wrapping the app with InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering to root.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage layout with a hero section using a background image, brand logo, intro text, and feature cards.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, typography, plugins, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, issues, and notes describing the Smart Janghai website build state.
